name: grainraycast
title: GrainRaycast
description: Allows you to search the Grain Lang documentation from Raycast.
author: spotandjake

commands.name: grain-search
commands.title: Grain
commands.subtitle: search
commands.description: Allows you to search the Grain Lang documentation from Raycast.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
